title: S6: How to make the European Green Deal work (Part One)
description: The European Green Deal will be a defining feature of Ursula Von der Leyen's incoming Commission. But will carbon border taxes and single carbon prices be enough to make Europe carbon-neutral by 2050? This week, Nicholas Barrett and Guntram Wolff discuss Bruegel's new paper 'How to make the European Green Deal Work' with Gr√©gory Claeys and Simone Tagliapietra.
itunes:author: Bruegel
